decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan: unnumbered. Drawings: Existing Site Plan 1), Proposed Site Plan (2), Proposed Trellis (3), Proposed Side Elevation (4), Proposed Side Elevation (5), Proposed Decking (6).Received: 03/10/2016. Flood Risk Assessment. Received 17/01/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Retrospective application for erection of trellis onto existing fencing, replace existing decking with new support beams and construction of an open sided gazebo.
